treepackage

Class BSTreeNode<E>

  • java.lang.Object
    • treepackage.BSTreeNode<E>
  • Type Parameters:
    E - The type of data stored in the node.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class BSTreeNode<E>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    BSTreeNode.java
    Version:
    1.0 Class Description: This class represents a node in BSTree.
    Author:
    Jiyeon Heo, Tze-chi Chan, and Parinthorn Songsana
